messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Surf music, was Eminem
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh, no, Arizona has miles and miles of beach... just no water ;-) Although Puerto Penasco *is* only 4 hours away... dar
messages.messageBody:
On Tue, 27 Aug 2002 14:47:38 -0700 "Karin" <curtkar@...> writes:
> Karin in AZ (far away from the beach)

Oh, no, Arizona has miles and miles of beach... just no water ;-)

Although Puerto Penasco *is* only 4 hours away...

dar

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Surf music, was Eminem
messages.msgSnippet: ... I want to see it! I love watching surfing of any kind - I even like watching skateboarding, even though I ve never tried surfing and only skateboarded when
messages.messageBody:
"Betsy" <ecsamhill@...> wrote:

> **
>
> I know the lyrics and all the harmonies to just about every doo-wop and
> surf
> song that was ever on the radio, but I never wanted my boyfriend to beat
> anyone else up, nor do I want to have tough-guy boyfriend who drive GTOs
> and
> motorcycles, nor do I want to just have a boyfriend and get married.
> Nor,
> when I was young, did I ever become that airheaded, violent character of
> that style of music. **
>
> OK, but do you wanna run out and see the new surfer girl movie? (Blue
> Crush) It looks, from the promos, like it has gorgeous waves and
> gorgeous girls in it. I'm not sure what kind of music is featured.
>


I want to see it! I love watching surfing of any kind - I even like watching
skateboarding, even though I've never tried surfing and only skateboarded
when I was a teen.

Karin in AZ (far away from the beach)

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Surf music, was Eminem
messages.msgSnippet: ** I know the lyrics and all the harmonies to just about every doo-wop and surf song that was ever on the radio, but I never wanted my boyfriend to beat anyone
messages.messageBody:
**

I know the lyrics and all the harmonies to just about every doo-wop and
surf
song that was ever on the radio, but I never wanted my boyfriend to beat
anyone else up, nor do I want to have tough-guy boyfriend who drive GTOs
and
motorcycles, nor do I want to just have a boyfriend and get married.
Nor,
when I was young, did I ever become that airheaded, violent character of
that style of music. **

OK, but do you wanna run out and see the new surfer girl movie? (Blue
Crush) It looks, from the promos, like it has gorgeous waves and
gorgeous girls in it. I'm not sure what kind of music is featured.

There was also an Australian indie movie about a girl surfer called
Puberty Blues that I saw long ago. I don't know if it is available on videos.

Betsy
